description: Developer exclusion criteria configuration based on resource constraints and computational limitations

settings.cap_reasoning_template: FLOP estimate capped at {cap_value:.1e} due to resource constraint policy: {reason}

exclusion_criteria: Limited computational budget for 1e25+ FLOP training runs
Insufficient access to large-scale GPU/TPU infrastructure
No demonstrated history of frontier model training
Primary focus on applications rather than model development
